text: The Great Wizards' War was Lim-Dûl 's second campaign to dominate Shandalar and was fought against the five wizard schools founded by the Guardian . During the war, the Black Guildlord was killed. Upon Lim-Dûl's defeat, the Guardian removed the necromancer's soul from Azar ’s body and imprisoned it within a magical artifact . This allowed the Great Barrier , now powered by Lim-Dûl's soul, to remain intact.
